name: todo-elm
description: TodoMVC using Elm - Demonstration for DWX 2019

scripts.release: cp node_modules/tdodomvc-app-css/index.css ../Backend/static/index.css && cp node_modules/todomvc-common/base.css ../Backend/static/base.css && elm make ./src/Main.elm --optimize --output ../Backend/static/todo.js
